description: Source file implementing the SessionClient class within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace. Contains methods for setting and clearing content access, handling HTTP PUT requests, and interacting with device info and logging utilities.

classes.name: SessionClient
classes.description: A client class to manage session content access, including setting and clearing content access rights via HTTP requests, and managing relevant device information.

methods.name: uint32_t SetContentAccess(const string & appId,const string & availabilities,const string & entitlements)
methods.description: Sets content access rights for a specified appId with given availabilities and entitlements, by constructing a URL and sending an HTTP PUT request.

methods.name: uint32_t ClearContentAccess(const string & appId)
methods.description: Clears content access rights for a specified appId by sending a PUT request with empty arrays.

methods.name: uint32_t ProcessPut(const string & url,const string & data,string & response,string & responseHeader)
methods.description: Handles the HTTP PUT operation, including token management and error handling.

methods.name: SessionClient(const string & host,const string & clientId,DeviceInfoPtr deviceInfoPtr)

ctags.name: ProcessPut
ctags.pattern: /^        uint32_t SessionClient::ProcessPut(const string &url, const string &data, string &respon/
ctags.signature: (const string & url,const string & data,string & response,string & responseHeader)

ctags.name: SessionClient
ctags.pattern: /^        SessionClient::SessionClient(const string &host, const string &clientId, DeviceInfoPtr d/

ctags.name: SetContentAccess
ctags.signature: (const string & appId,const string & availabilities,const string & entitlements)
